songs.title: I’m Gonna Be
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Big Sean]
Westside...

[Chorus: Big Sean]
I'm gonna be everything I wanna be
So I'm gonna be what I wanna be
And say, I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm-I'm gonna be
Everything I wanna be
So I'm gonna be what I wanna be
And say, I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm-I'm gonna be

[Verse 1: Big Sean]
Ohh, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be
And when these bitch ass motherfuckers
Told me that I wasn't gonna be everything that I see
I went home and said, I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm-I'm gonna be
Count money that these bitch ass motherfuckers
Said I wasn't gonna see, gonna see
Cause I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be

[Verse 2: Jhene Aiko]
Everything I ever dreamed cause I'm a fucking star
Worlds apart...
If you want to go it's a wonderful ride
Where there's no limit, no sky
Well alright, alright

[Chorus: Big Sean & Jhene Aiko]
I'm gonna be everything I wanna be
So I'm gonna be what I wanna be
And say, I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm-I'm gonna be
Everything I wanna be
So I'm gonna be what I wanna be
And say, I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm-I'm gonna be

[Verse 3: Big Sean]
Cause that's just how I live, I'm living, living
Living, yep
Living, living
I'm living, yeah
I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be-be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be everything I wanna be
So I'm gonna be what I want to be
What they want from me?
What they want from me?
What they want from me?
Told them that I'm only go be what I be
Everybody wanna call now they gonna see
Everything worked for me

[Chorus: Big Sean & Jhene Aiko]
I'm gonna be everything I wanna be
So I'm gonna be what I wanna be
And say, I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm-I'm gonna be
Everything I wanna be
So I'm gonna be what I wanna be
And say, I'm gonna be, I'm gonna be
I'm gonna be, I'm-I'm gonna be

[Outro: Big Sean]
Yep, ay, I told my...
